explanation: Several users expressed bullishness or discussed support levels and possible all-time high breakouts for BTC. Comments like 'long btc and sleep', 'millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high', and 'turning above 100 and staying above mean we have support down' suggest a positive sentiment. However, some users also mentioned caution or waiting, and a few indicated shorting opportunities, so confidence is set to medium.
